    • Interfaces
      Interface
      Preview Feature
      Description
      java.lang.ScopedValue.CallableOpPREVIEW
      Scoped Values
      An operation that returns a result and may throw an exception.
      java.util.concurrent.StructuredTaskScope.SubtaskPREVIEW
      Structured Concurrency
      Represents a subtask forked with StructuredTaskScope.fork(Callable)PREVIEW.
      javax.crypto.KDFParametersPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      A specification of Key Derivation Function (KDFPREVIEW) parameters.
      javax.crypto.spec.HKDFParameterSpecPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      Parameters for the combined Extract, Expand, or Extract-then-Expand operations of the HMAC-based Key Derivation Function (HKDF).
    • Classes
      Class
      Preview Feature
      Description
      java.io.IOPREVIEW
      Simple Source Files and Instance Main Methods
      A collection of static convenience methods that provide access to system console for implicitly declared classes.
      java.lang.ScopedValuePREVIEW
      Scoped Values
      A value that may be safely and efficiently shared to methods without using method parameters.
      java.lang.ScopedValue.CarrierPREVIEW
      Scoped Values
      A mapping of scoped values, as keys, to values.
      java.util.concurrent.StructuredTaskScopePREVIEW
      Structured Concurrency
      A basic API for structured concurrency.
      java.util.concurrent.StructuredTaskScope.ShutdownOnFailurePREVIEW
      Structured Concurrency
      A StructuredTaskScope that captures the exception of the first subtask to failPREVIEW.
      java.util.concurrent.StructuredTaskScope.ShutdownOnSuccessPREVIEW
      Structured Concurrency
      A StructuredTaskScope that captures the result of the first subtask to complete successfullyPREVIEW.
      javax.crypto.KDFPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      This class provides the functionality of a Key Derivation Function (KDF), which is a cryptographic algorithm for deriving additional keys from input keying material (IKM) and (optionally) other data.
      javax.crypto.KDFSpiPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      This class defines the Service Provider Interface (SPI) for the Key Derivation Function (KDFPREVIEW) class.
      javax.crypto.spec.HKDFParameterSpec.BuilderPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      This Builder builds Extract and ExtractThenExpand objects.
      javax.crypto.spec.HKDFParameterSpec.ExpandPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      Defines the input parameters of an Expand operation as defined in RFC 5869.
      javax.crypto.spec.HKDFParameterSpec.ExtractPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      Defines the input parameters of an Extract operation as defined in RFC 5869.
      javax.crypto.spec.HKDFParameterSpec.ExtractThenExpandPREVIEW
      Key Derivation Function API
      Defines the input parameters of an Extract-then-Expand operation as defined in RFC 5869.

      Description
      java.util.concurrent.StructureViolationExceptionPREVIEW

    • Methods
      Method
      Preview Feature
      Description
      com.sun.source.tree.ImportTree.isModule()PREVIEW
      Module Import Declarations
      Returns true if this is an module import declaration..
      java.io.Console.print(Object)PREVIEW
      Simple Source Files and Instance Main Methods
      Writes a string representation of the specified object to this console's output stream and then flushes the console.
      java.io.Console.println()PREVIEW
      Simple Source Files and Instance Main Methods
      Terminates the current line in this console's output stream using System.lineSeparator() and then flushes the console.
      java.io.Console.println(Object)PREVIEW
      Simple Source Files and Instance Main Methods
      Writes a string representation of the specified object to this console's output stream, terminates the line using System.lineSeparator() and then flushes the console.
      java.io.Console.readln()PREVIEW
      Simple Source Files and Instance Main Methods
      Reads a single line of text from this console.
      java.io.Console.readln(String)PREVIEW
      Simple Source Files and Instance Main Methods
      Writes a prompt as if by calling print, then reads a single line of text from this console.
      jdk.jshell.JShellConsole.readLine()PREVIEW
      Simple Source Files and Instance Main Methods
      Reads a single line of text from the console.
